description: Try our easy to follow Banana Lassi recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Smoothie & frappé,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Banana,Halal,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Banana Lassi Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Put all the ingredients in a food processor or blender and blend until smooth.
Pour into tall glasses and serve chilled, decorated with extra cardamom seeds if liked. This makes an ideal breakfast drink.
